Whenever Hargau’s Gravetrawler attacks, you may have it make an experience check. [i](Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than this creature’s power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
When Hargau’s Gravetrawler dies, each opponent loses life equal to the highest mana value of cards you own in exile.
